title: Ornot NuYarn Merino Riding T
content:
Soft enough to live in, tough enough to take on every ride. The Ornot NuYarn Merino Riding T is made from 100% RWS-certified Merino wool. Wool is nature’s original performance fiber is designed to wick sweat, regulate temperature, and resist odor. What makes Nuyarn® Merino special? It’s unbelievably soft, never itchy, and built to handle whatever you throw at it, while boasting 5X faster drying, 8X more abrasion resistance, with 85% more elasticity, 50% greater tensile strength, and 120% stronger seams.

With a discreet rear pocket, you can keep small essentials close at hand. Stash your sunglasses or a snack for easy access mid-ride. The Merino Riding Tee is ready to be your everyday favorite—on the bike and off. But whatever you do, do NOT put it in the dryer!

Specs:

  • Quick-drying, wicking and extremely breathable
  • Patented Nuyarn® Merino wool
  • 8.8x more abrasion resistance
  • 5x faster drying
  • 50% greater tensile strength
  • 78% Merino Wool, 22% Nylon
  • 100% RWS-certified Merino
  • Non-itchy 19-micron fine merino wool
  • Weight: 145 gsm
  • Bike specific tailoring
  • Rear pocket for sunglasses or other small items

Check it out for men and women at Ornot.
